name: Home (itch) (ebbali)
description:
Finding home can be difficult. In this short, narrative experience, you are helping 12 finding home, whatever that means. You will meet different character that either helps or hinder the journey. 

I have included pictures from magazines, books and websites including: 

Story by Victoria Miro, Victoria Miro  2021

GQ Magazine, April Edition 2022

Art Review - Power100, May Edition 2022

SLEEK - April Edition 2022

Screenshots from Urban Dictionary, https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Home, Taken on 24/4-2022

Background sound from BBC Sound Effects, Park, https://sound-effects.bbcrewind.co.uk/search?q=nature

The narrative was made in Unity with Fungus. 

The video contains a full playthrough.
